body:
@adg If golang can't do such thing, I have to build the c part manually, maybe something like:

	mkdir build
	cd build
	cmake ..
	make install # suppose /usr/lib/libmc.a is generated
	cd ../golibmc
	go build

instead of:

	go build

Python has [the ability](https://github.com/douban/libmc/blob/master/setup.py#L15) to do such work, so I wish golang can also do.
